Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Allows the New York state AFL-CIO to select a member to the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Allows the New York state AFL-CIO to select one of the five voting members to the metropolitan transportation authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1263, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to allowing the New York state AFL-CIO to select a member to the metropolitan transportation authority
